notes.text:
This update for jasper fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-51257: Fixed an out of bounds write in the JPC encoder (bsc#1218802).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An invalid memory write issue in Jasper-Software Jasper v.4.1.1 and before allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code.
notes.title: CVE description
